p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Get the first object connected to the specified object by a relation.
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Retrieves the first object connected to the specified object via the specified relation (see `Get Related Objects`).

This is a shortcut for `Get Related Objects` -> `Get First Object In List`.

Note: The relation can be followed in any direction, so if we have A -> B we can retrieve the first instance of A linked to a given instance of B, or the first instance of B linked to a given instance of A.
The object at the other side of the relation.
